snippet: With pitchers facing more stress on their elbows, the need for Tommy John surgery, the procedure pioneered by Frank Jobe, has never been more pronounced.
abstract: Tommy John surgery is more common than ever before as year-round demands put increasing stress on pitchers' elbows; advancements in the operation, and the rehabilitation process, have cut the the standard recovery period nearly in half in the four decades since it was developed.
lead_paragraph: With pitchers facing more stress on their elbows, the need for Tommy John surgery, the procedure pioneered by Frank Jobe, has never been more pronounced.

headline.seo: How Tommy John Surgery Has Evolved Since Frank Jobe
headline.main: A Revolutionary Surgery, Now as Typical as a Sinker
headline.print_headline: A Revolutionary Surgery, Now as Typical as a Sinker
